string-array.name: default_messages
string-array.item: Most people get ahead during the time that others waste.
Do one thing every day that scares you.
Don\’t regret the past, just learn from it.
It is the working man who is the happy man. It is the idle man who is the miserable man.
To be the best, you must be able to handle the worst.
The best revenge is massive success.
All you need is love.
There is no man living that can not do more than he thinks he can.
Never give up on something that you can\’t go a day without thinking about.
When he worked, he really worked. But when he played, he really PLAYED.
You can never cross the ocean until you have the courage to lose sight of the shore.
I am seeking. I am striving. I am in it with all my heart.
The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Live what you love.
We all have bad days, but one thing is true; no cloud is so dark that the sun can\’t shine through.
There are no shortcuts to any place worth going.
The greatest pleasure in life is doing what people say you cannot do.
Nobody cares if you can\'t dance well. Just get up and dance.
Even if you are on the right track, you\’ll get run over if you just sit there.
Men are born to succeed, not fail.
What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
Action is the foundational key to all success.

string-array.name: user_focused_messages
string-array.item: If you dream it, you can do it.
I can, therefore I am.
Action is the foundational key to all success.
The power of imagination makes us infinite.
May you live every day of your life.
Eighty percent of success is showing up.
A jug fills drop by drop.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
We become what we think about.
Dream big and dare to fail.
Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
It is the working man who is the happy man. It is the idle man who is the miserable man.
Patience, persistence and perspiration make an unbeatable combination for success.
All happiness depends on courage and work.
The best preparation for good work tomorrow is to do good work today.
Inspiration usually comes during work rather than before it.
When he worked, he really worked. But when he played, he really PLAYED.
Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.
Most people get ahead during the time that others waste.
The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
To pay attention, this is our endless and proper work.
Attempt the impossible in order to improve your work.
Life grants nothing to us mortals without hard work.
You do your best work if you do a job that makes you happy.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Wherever you go, go with all your heart!

string-array.name: user_not_focused_messages
string-array.item: Never, never, never give up!
Don\’t wait. The time will never be just right.
If not you, who? If not now, when?
Everything you can imagine is real.
Turn your wounds into wisdom.
Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
Life is trying things to see if they work.
Believe you can and you\’re halfway there.
The obstacle is the path.
You get what you settle for.
If you have never failed you have never lived.
Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
It is never too late to be what you might have been.
An obstacle is often a stepping stone.
If all you can do is crawl, start crawling.
Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
If we did the things we are capable of, we would astound ourselves.
If you\’re going through hell, keep going.
You\'re going to die.
Change your thoughts and you change your world.
Your time is limited, so don\’t waste it living someone else\’s life.
Some people dream of success… while others wake up and work hard at it.
We all have bad days, but one thing is true; no cloud is so dark that the sun can\’t shine through.
The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
If you don\’t run your own life, somebody else will.
Nobody cares if you can\'t dance well. Just get up and dance.
Even if you are on the right track, you\’ll get run over if you just sit there.
